creditline: The William Hood Dunwoody Fund and The Putnam Dana McMillan Fund
description: Soft plant fiber ball attached to a belt decorated with 10 vertical rows of chevrons and diamonds in dark fibers
markings: [FX980612], on dealer\'s tag, attached to back of ball
text: This type of waist belt, made entirely of raffia, was worn low on the hips by girls and young women. The pom-pom, attached to the belt by a knot, would have bobbed up and down during dancing.
title: Belt
